A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was terrible\, for those of us that are Star Wars fans deserve a redo of this movie. The way Luke was portrayed was just a down right rip off. What in the world was Rian Johnson thinking about when he wrote this. I'd rather watch paint dry than this movie ever again. Good luck to JJ Abrams trying to fix this saga in episode 9.i guess the good thing is\, it can't be worse than this one. I am extremely disappointed in this movie\, it was tough giving it a 1 Star.
